description:
As an admin
              I want to have a log to trace the approvals done by the admins
              And a grid to see this traceability
name: The admin should be able to see merchant approval log section

elements.name: The admin should be allowed to see the merchant approval log section

steps.name: the admin is on the endabank login page
the admin types in a valid email
the admin types in a password
the admin clicks on login buttton
the admin clicks on merchant approval log button
